pages.page:
since 1884
ABOUT US
Çelikerler began as a hot blacksmith in Bartın Kumluca in 1844. In 2003, it was incorporated as, "ÇELİKERLER ÇELİK KONSTRÜKSİYON İNŞ. SAN. TİC. LTD. ŞTİ" .
Today, Çelikerler combines its past experience with modern technology to manufacture steel constructions in its 25,000 m² production facilities.
c
i d
m e t q f i d y n e a t With its wide machinery and qualified technical team, t W i s w i e a c h n e r n u a l i d c h i a l e a m ,
h i t Çelikerler closely follows domestic and international developments in the sector and provides world-class quality and service in its field. Çelikerler company has expanded its quality and service boundaries in mosque structures, prefabricated houses, steel construction houses, heavy industrial structures, containers, construction site structures and has realized many successful projects in Turkey and abroad. d e a a
n i p o t
p
h e p y The company has adopted customer satisfaction as a principle and T e o m p a n a s a d o t d u t m e r a t f c i n a s a r c i l n c h s
s i o s c expands its product range without compromising on quality. Çelikerler prioritizes people in every project and adheres to occupational safety rules in its manufacturing and assembly sites. The company will continue to execute its projects while adding new achievements.

VISION
Construction sector to design, manufacture and construct high value-added, innovative, reliable, environmentally friendly, cost effective, high e l d t y s quality steel and q a i t e n u l a prefabricated structures. MISSION Our goal is to become a leading producer of steel construction and prefabricated structures in the construction sector, recognized globally and ranked among the top 100

“ QUALITY, ROBUST COMMON LANGUAGE OF BUSINESS.”
since 1884

ÇELİKERLER QUALITY AND ASSURANCE operates in 12 countries worldwide.
Türkiye Qatar Iceland Germany
France Azerbaijan Switzerland UAE
Iraq Bulgaria Poland Sudan since 1884
